info: Martin Noriander (formerly Martin Andersson), also known as Instant Remedy, is a Swedish citizen born in 1976. He makes dance/house remixes of C64-SIDs, and in 2002 he released a C64 remix album named Instant Remedy. The 15th track, Commando, was partially featured in AMV Hell III: The Motion Picture, placed over a clip from the anime "Bottle Fairy", as a comedic Anime Music Video (AMV).
